title: Heritage Den Haag Escape near Royal Gardens & Hofkwartier Quarter
description:
Follow cobblestone paths from Hofkwartier Quarter to the heritage Park Centraal Den Haag, where a wealth of historic monuments, trendy hangouts, stunning gardens and more are at your doorstep. Set within the oldest part of the city, you can immediately immerse yourself in the history of this fascinating destination and visit the famous Royal Gardens, The Peace Palace and Mauritshuis Museum - home to Vermeer's Girl with a Pearl Earring, or wind your way through charming streets peppered with boutiques, café or bars.

At the end of each day, return to your stylish hotel where modern accents, including geometric-style carpets and rich textures in deep jewel tones, perfectly complement the history of the building which dates to 1858. When you’re not relaxing in your comfortable room, take a seat in the hotel’s private garden or head to the bar on the ground floor for a charcuterie platter or a classic cocktail.

title: The Hague Sophisticated Escape within the Royal Quarter
description: Enjoy sophisticated elegance and charm when you stay at the heritage voco The Hague, an IHG Hotel. Located in a former bank building, this stylish hotel showcases original features such as glistening chandeliers, polished marble and timber floors. World-class international cuisine meets Dutch heritage at the hotel's chic restaurant while sumptuous cocktails await in the sultry bar. Venture out of the hotel to stroll around the adjacent Kneuterdijk Palace.
location_description: voco The Hague, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Kneuterdijk 8, 2514 EN Den Haag, South Holland, Netherlands

vendor_name: Hotel Indigo The Hague - Palace Noordeinde
title: Heritage Hague Escape in Iconic Royal Quarter Near Palace Noordeinde
description: A contemporary blend of modernity, regal elegance and Dutch heritage, the Hotel Indigo The Hague - Palace Noordeinde, an IHG Hotel, is ideally positioned in the heart of the Royal Quarter. Set behind the facade of a former bank, Art Deco stained glass, brass lamps and marble columns pay homage to the hotel's heritage. Step outside to discover the charming, cobbled streets which lead to Palace Noordeinde, stroll the palace gardens or dine at one of the elegant local bistros.
location_description: Hotel Indigo The Hague - Palace Noordeinde, an IHG hotel
